name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Ask Haiku Reader to share a poem”
”Tell Haiku Reader to read a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader is a simple skill that reads out a limited assortment of meaningless and meaningful haikus to the user whenever prompted. The intent of this skill is to mess around a little bit and perhaps invoke some thought. 

A few things you could say to activate it include (but aren't limited to):
"Alexa, open Haiku Reader"
"Start Haiku Reader and read me a poem"
"Ask Haiku Reader what poems it has today"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
